content.description: In the code segment below, myList is an ArrayList of integers. The code segment is intended to remove all elements with the value 0 from myList.
content.question: int j = 0;while (j < myList.size()){if (myList.get(j) == 0){myList.remove(j);}j++;}The code segment does not always work as intended. For which of the following lists does the code segment NOT produce the correct result?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
